thread.title: SamMobile Daily Recap: February 13, 2017 — New Galaxy S8 renders, Galaxy Note 8 codename and more!
thread.title_full: SamMobile Daily Recap: February 13, 2017 — New Galaxy S8 renders, Galaxy Note 8 codename and more!

author: Adnan F.
title: SamMobile Daily Recap: February 13, 2017 — New Galaxy S8 renders, Galaxy Note 8 codename and more!
text:
Adnan F. / 9 hours ago 
We are aware that many of our readers in the United States and other regions across the globe are unable to follow all of the stories that we publish here on SamMobile every single day. We do post quite a lot of stories and as most of it breaks during the European hours, thus readers in other regions miss out. Our solution to this problem is the daily recap . 
You’ll find a comprehensive list down below of all of the stories that were published on SamMobile today. The stories are broken up into their respective categories so that you can easily find the ones you’re most interested in at a glance. 
Business
